undated-ticket.name: 1 day undated pass
undated-ticket.description: 1 day park access whenever you want

dated-ticket.name: 1-7 days dated pass
dated-ticket.description: 1-7 days park access on a scheduled date

special-ticket.name: special pass
special-ticket.description: customised park access for special events or occasions

fast-track.name: fast track option
fast-track.description: don't waste time in lines and make the most of your visit skipping the queues

VIP-access.name: VIP access
VIP-access.description: A VIP pass allows for better seating in attractions at the amusement park, and early access/later leave in the park.

nightshow.name: shadows of britannia
nightshow.description: Shadows of Britannia is a one-of-a-kind nocturnal spectacle that immerses audiences in the rich history and culture of England.

the-tudor-suite.description: The Tudor Suite is a stunning accommodation option that transports guests back in time to the golden age of the Tudor dynasty.
the-tudor-suite.name: The Tudor Suite

the-crown-jewel.description: The Crown Jewel Suite is the epitome of luxury and grandeur.
the-crown-jewel.name: The Crown Jewel

the-windsor-room.name: The Windsor Room
the-windsor-room.description: The Windsor Rose Suite is a luxurious and elegant accommodation fit for royalty.

the-rose-garden-view.name: The Rose Garden View
the-rose-garden-view.description: In partnership with LegoÂ®, this suite features a unique Lego-themed decor that will delight children and adults alike.
